column4: 63 of fort sumner passed away tuesday
column6: 2015 from injuries sustained in an automobile accident in fort sumner. she was born may 15
column9: the daughter of lc and billie ann (norman)carter. she attended enmu roswell and received her degrees in cosmetology and as a dental hygienist. she is survived by a son shea hunt
column10: her father and his wife l c and susan carter all of fort sumner. cremation will take place
column11: no services are planned. arrangements are under the direction of chavez funeral home
